gw.bizrules

Interface IRuleAction


  • public interface IRuleAction
    A rule action implementation is a wrapper around an app call, which provides information about the parameters this app call needs and a method to actually invoke the call. An implementation must be stateless and reusable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String describe(RuleCommandDefinition definition)
      Generate display text describing this command definition
      void execute(IRuleCommand command)
      Perform the action
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CommandParameterDefinition> getCommandParameterDefinitions() 
      RuleActionKey getKey() 
      default com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> validateCommandDefinition(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Pair<RuleCommandParameter,IType>> parameterAndTypes)
      Callback for validating the RuleParameters for this action.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        RuleActionKey getKey()
        Returns:
        the RuleActionType associated with this RuleAction

      • getCommandParameterDefinitions

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CommandParameterDefinition> getCommandParameterDefinitions()
        Returns:
        a mapping from command parameter names to their definitions

      • execute

        void execute(IRuleCommand command)
        Perform the action
        Parameters:
        command - the RuleCommand containing the evaluated expressions of RuleCommandDefinitions for a rule

      • describe

        java.lang.String describe(RuleCommandDefinition definition)
        Generate display text describing this command definition
        Parameters:
        definition - the RuleCommandDefinition to be described

      • validateCommandDefinition

        default com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> validateCommandDefinition(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Pair<RuleCommandParameter,IType>> parameterAndTypes)
        Callback for validating the RuleParameters for this action. The parsed type of each parameter is also given, if known. The type may be null, e.g. if the expression is empty. All individual parameters are guaranteed to be present if this method is called.
        Returns:
        Return a mapping from parameter name to validation errors for that paramter. A null key can be used to signify errors that don't apply to any particular parameter, but instead to the overall command definition. Errors associated with a particular parameter will be returned from that parameter's RuleCommandParameterHolder.validate().
